DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the investigators study is to test the analgesic effect of rectal indomethacin during Intrauterine device insertion.
DOC.brief_title: Indomethacin Use in Pain Relief During Intrauterine Device Insertion
DOC.criteria: Women not taken analgesics or anxiolytics in the 24 hours prior insertion Women not taken misoprostol prior to intrauterine device insertion Women who will accept to participate in the study Any contraindication to intrauterine device placement
